Desc: Adds a new company record to Highrise.
Title: company/add
Usage: local Id = highrise.company.add{name="Acme Co.", background="Met this company at a tradeshow"}

Returns.Desc: The unique ID of the company that has been created (String)

SummaryLine: Add a new company record to highrise.
Examples: local Id = highrise.company.add{name="Acme Co.", background="Met this company at a trade show"}
